modName: Dual Sheath Redux patch for Beyond Skyrim - Bruma
summary: Dual Sheath Redux patch for Beyond Skyrim - Bruma.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b][ABOUT][/b]

[size=4]I looked everywhere and could not find a DSR patch for BS-B, so I made this patch using the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647]amazing guide[/url] by SlothAbility.
[b]
[/b][size=6][b][REQUIREMENTS][/b]

[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84946]BEYOND SKYRIM - BRUMA[/url][/size]
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]DUAL SHEATH REDUX[/url][/size]
[b]
[INSTALLATION][/b]

[size=4]-Drop the contents of the mod into Skyrim's Data folder. I recommend using a mod manager like MO or NMM.[/size]
[b][size=5]-Run Dual Sheath Redux Patcher after installing.[/size][/b]

[b][CREDITS][/b]
[size=4][url=https://beyondskyrim.org/beyond-skyrim-bruma-credits]The Beyond Skyrim Team[/url][/size]
[size=4]Neovalen for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url][/size]
[size=4]Slothability for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647]amazing guide[/url] for making DSR patches.[/size]

[b][MY OTHER MODS][/b]

[size=4][URL=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82560]Talyn Follower[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86137]Talyn Follower Android Edition[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88635]Crypto Septim[/url][/size]

[u][size=5][b]I hope this patch to be useful for all of you. Thanks for downloading and happy 2018.[/b][/size][/u]
[/size][/size][/size]
author: Ekans
